TopicTitle: Refueling and collecting sciences from reusable craft

Articles.Content:
It would be nice if it where possable to refuel craft at the space port. Maybe an option next in the tracking center to refuel any craft landed if they are landed next to the space port. (or maybe a some docking ports at near the start of the runway that SSTO craft can use. There would need to be a few at differnet hights and maybe some verticals ones that VTOL carfts can use.)

ATM the only way to do this is to spawn a fuel tank on the run way with docking ports and they recover it when done. Which is a bit of a pain.

Also it would be nice it would be nice if you could colect science from any craft landed at or near the Space Port with out getting rid of the craft.
You could recover the craft and launch it again. It's basicly the same as bringing it in the hanger and than out again, after a few repairs and other things
I was thinking if they every added cost to the game. But even with out that it feels better to refly your craft with out taking them back to the hanger.

Kerbal attachment system does this, I have reused some of my SSTOs repeatedly.

For the most part you are better of recovering and relaunching. I imagine costs once they are implemented will be very reasonable. After all, even the space shuttle needed a LOT of work after each flight.
